undergraduate.sat_range: N/A (UC system is test-free for admissions)
undergraduate.act_range: N/A (UC system is test-free for admissions)
undergraduate.essays_required: Yes, 4 UC Personal Insight Questions required
undergraduate.supplemental_materials: Required for some majors (e.g., arts portfolios), not for most programs

costs.financial_aid_available: Yes; CA residents eligible for need-based aid including Cal Grant, Blue & Gold Opportunity Plan (tuition covered for families <$80,000), out-of-state/international merit scholarships limited

required_courses: A-G UC subject requirements (15 courses including history/social science, English, math, lab science, foreign language, arts, college-prep elective)
recommended_courses: Math and science courses beyond minimums
admission_requirements.extracurricular_importance: Important for competitive applicants; leadership, achievements, and service valued

student_life.dining_options: Numerous dining halls, cafes, restaurants on campus and nearby
student_life.study_abroad_programs: Numerous UC-wide and Berkeley-led programs available

special_features: Large and diverse academic program selection
Access to Bay Area and Silicon Valley careers
Vibrant campus activism and student organizations
